attributes.action: Extend furlough payments for the Self Employed for a further 3 months
attributes.additional_details: Self Employed furlough payments ended in August 2020. Many Self Employed are left without an income due to the Coronavirus.
attributes.background: Please extend the Self Employed furlough payments for a further 3 months.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320655

Since you started your petition the Government has announced an extension to the Self-Employment Income Support Scheme. You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/self-employment-income-support-scheme-grant-extension/self-employment-income-support-scheme-grant-extension
